data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smit, Harry (2018): A new species of the genus Decussobates Cook, 1988 from Argentina, with the first description of the male (Acari: Hydrachnidia: Hygrobatidae). Zootaxa 4471 (1): 182-184, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4471.1.10|2 occurrences
